org.matsim.contrib.common.stats

Class DiscretizerComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.contrib.common.stats.DiscretizerComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Discretizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinLogDiscretizer

    public class DiscretizerComposite
extends Object
implements Discretizer
    A composition of two discretizers. Values are first discretized with the first discretizer, the bin indicies are the discretized with the second discretizer, e.g., meters to kilometers and then kilometers in log2 bins.
    Author:
    illenberger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiscretizerComposite(Discretizer first, Discretizer second)
      Creates a new discretizer composite.
